ser_port_t Struct Reference

This structure describes a serial port logical object. It contains all context required by a single serial port.

Data Fields

  • IMG_BOOL bInitialised
  • unsigned char port_number
  • signed long use_cts_rts
  • SER_SETTINGS_T port_settings
  • KRN_POOL_T io_block_pool
  • SER_LINK_T tx
  • SER_LINK_T rx
  • img_uint8 aui8InternalMem [(70)]
